extendedInfo.description: The official app of the Mark Levin Show.  Listen to "The Great One" live M-F, 6-9pm (EST) or select an archived episode from the Mark Levin Audio Rewind.

reviews.title: Bad. Bad. Bad
reviews.comment: This app crashed my phone so bad I had to remove the battery to reset!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix App
reviews.comment: Mark you\'re Great BUT YOUR APP SUCKS THERE BUDDY! !!! app keeps crashing and can\'t do anything else on phone when listening to. Fix these and on behalf of all your fans I thank you
reviews.author: Randy Hall

reviews.title: Very cumbersome
reviews.comment: Mark raves about this app when callers use it but I hate it. I just reinstalled after removing it in frustration. It crashed 3 times in 10 minutes.  HTC EVO 3d
reviews.author: David Hoover

reviews.title: App is lousy!
reviews.comment: Love the show Mark, but the app STINKS. Can\'t count how many times I\'ve reinstalled it to try and make it work properly. Drops the podcast stream mid show, will not exit or turn off. Sometimes I have to shut the phone off to exit the app and its still on when i restart. I used to stream directly from the website to avoid all of this, but since that\'s changed we are forced to use this now. I listen half as much now because of this app being too unwieldy. Used to listen every single day...
reviews.author: Dave Griffin

reviews.title: Love Mark, hate the app
reviews.comment: App frequently crashes on my Droid DNA. When it does work and I attemp to exit, it keeps running in the background until I restart my phone.   I love your show, Mark, but if I can\'t catch you live via satellite in my car, I guess I won\'t be able to listen.
reviews.author: Joel Duffy

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: Love the podcast feature. I can listen to shows I miss anytime!  Thank you Mark!
reviews.author: Jeff Montgomery

reviews.title: Mark: A-  App: TOTALLY USELESS
reviews.comment: Buffer too small and app freezes hard after rebuffering a couple of times (requires killing from task manager).  No handling of varying data availability and bandwidth - instead, just hangs & freezes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DINC 2
reviews.comment: Great content, but the app is horrible. It is the worst app I have ever tolerated. 90% of the time I use the app it will freeze, force closed, or be unresponsive. If it werent for Mark Levin I would have uninstalled this a while ago.
reviews.author: Mike Davis

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: Motorola Droid Razr Maxx - I just installed the updates and still have the same problem. Crashes while listening live. I think I\'ll email Mark,  tell him he needs to put his foot up someone\'s @SS! Only problem with frothing to i heart radio is everytime I get locked in on a  station that airs Mark\'s show live, they change the schedule then I have to start searching the stations again!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great, one tiny request it needs a pause button or a time bar so you can pick up where u left off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No app can do the Great One justice
reviews.comment: Needs a completely redone interface. Focus on simplicity playing live or rewinds shows. Please provide a resume show for each played and partially listened to. I usually listen in the car and this interface is gonna kill me! Blue tooth audio hot button is a must! Since the site redo im now forced to stream over 4g instead of downloading the shows prior to my trips, what would our founding fathers think of this app?
reviews.author: Allen Williams

reviews.title: 5 star content,1 star app
reviews.comment: App fails to launch, eventually gets going after a few tries. Frustrating. Samsung GS3.  Shame though as Mark is the authority on conservative talk radio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes constantly
reviews.comment: Love Mark hate app never fails to crash during an interesting discussion it is not my equipment everything else works perfectly
reviews.author: Brent Rowell

reviews.title: Love Mark!
reviews.comment: Love mark levin and his genius and intense show. But the app has crashing issues alot!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App needs improvement
reviews.comment: Mark is THE MAN, but his app team has let him down. Some points: Must be in landscape? Why  Doesn\'t always pause on  incoming call.   Covers notification area, so you can\'t pull down and see your notifications. There is no reason for this.   I gave the app an extra star because it\'s Mark! And the content is free. He didn\'t have to do that, but he did.
reviews.author: Matt Kopf

reviews.title: Crashes/can\'t kill/no phone pause
reviews.comment: Horrible app.  Crashes when u want to listen and then can\'t close it when you want. Can\'t even kill it with task killer!  To top it off it doesn\'t pause when u take a phone call.  Nothing better than taking to mom while having Mark yelling over her.  Uninstalled.  Way too many bugs for now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keep Up The Fantastic & Amazing work Mark!  I love your show!   Best show on the radio & on my phone!  No BS, just common sense, logic & reasoning, & truth about our Country & Constitution & what happens when you elect a tyrant!   Love, \"JR\"
reviews.author: JR Rupert

reviews.title: Super great app puts market head of all the other guys
reviews.comment: Marks the best on the radio hands down and this apps is as good as he is . yeah every once in awhile it has its problems but mark has one of his great people behind the scenes on it fixing it I never have to worry if my stations playing a ball game and interrupting mark I just go to his app
reviews.author: John R

reviews.title: Good show exelling app.
reviews.comment: Best app ever.
reviews.author: Taylor Buckley

reviews.title: Love Mark, Hate his app
reviews.comment: Hate to say it but on a functional basis this is one of the worst apps. Horribly buggy. Sometimes impossible to close without rebooting phone. Confusing controls. Freezes my phone. Uses excess battery. Better to get the podcast through other apps.
reviews.author: Michael Andrews
